reviewContent: food poisoning on 30th birthday i chose sapori based yelp reviews birthday dinner and yes food good the service good servings huge tons left take home the butternut squash ravioli delicious and culprit these factors take rating one star three the problem leftovers maybe dressing salad interacted aluminum take home container maybe someone use contaminated utensil transferring food container i live near restaurant food went straight fridge got back and none contained meat so fault the cannoli salad i ate next night i finished cannoli i started feel sick i back speed nearly 2 days afterward worst food poisoning i ve many years i able eat homemade pasta since though i m willing eventually give sapori another shot yet my birthday back february another birthday may pass i give another try

reviewContent: i thought restaurant going good considering two great restaurants thyme timo we got restaurant half hour reservation didnt seem packed even though bar reception area tiny we went bar asked two different glasses red wine they one glasses requested selected different one 5 minutes later next bottle well oooook didnt restaurant open up so boyfriend asked bartender ok dont tell start there she promised everything else available selected another glass that too this extremely irritating i wanted glass wine is much ask by time found two different glasses wine table ready we opted sit inside slightly windy outside we waited 20 minutes waiter finally showed up we ordered bottle wine 10 minutes later voila returns telling us again wine stock this starting get really annoying i seriously considered leaving go la scarola which amazing right across street he came back another 10 minutes later got next bottle selection thank goodness it the waiter proceeded apologize advance service nice do we placed orders the pear salad mozzerella procuitto appetizers spicy pasta bf beef one me we got appetizers obviously brought wrong procuitto wait 10 minutes someone came brought correct one as salads brought salad plates split even though gone way tell would splitting like everyone else around us had by time got plates already done salads the main course ok the pasta tasted like something i make home beef tender dry thats possible beyond me noone checked see ok wanted pepper anything the waiter finally showed another 35 minutes later take dishes away apologized shrugged shoulders said ayy i do this one worst restaurants honestly especially chicago many great restaurants particularly italian restaurants its shame actual restaurant really pretty patio beautiful

reviewContent: probably one overrated pizza joints chicago over years i ve heard many people rave place dinner plans wicker park work out i decided finally cross place list places try everybody says try brews much drinker i food started spinach tomato dip appetizer big mistake not almost tomatoes it served seemed non flavored doritos really i m snob needs anything fancy i problem paying extra quality charge people 7 bucks something obviously cheap wrong the dip ok tasting i would complaint cost half price dip would mind blowing justify cost it definitely wasn t on pizza piece offers standard fare plus less mainstream veggies three types pizzas standard w o sauce w o cheese i m sort traditionalist comes i put pies especially trying new place i went regular red style sausage mushrooms piece gets points getting portion size right medium rather big but pizza so so best the crust body center almost soggy making little chore eat w o making mess the sauce nothing special even little salty toppings better hole in the wall pizza i hate it definitely earn hype i hearing meh would probably fitting description aside food everything else expected there problems service i like music playing stereo although tiny bit loud so two people 1 beer 1 appetizer 1 medium pizza w 2 premium toppings 40 bucks including tip which bad dinner out i think much awesome pizza i could ve eaten other much better places almost half cost going back piece add up

reviewContent: i think i must lived chicago former life ever since first visiting 1995 always felt like home time i return i try return lot anyway calo s i introduced restaurant 3 years ago dear friend lives area first encounter little pillows heaven called asiago or gorgonzola gnocchi there literally descriptive enough words describe flavor sensations provided little morsels to honest i notice much anything else ambiance service staff food even though i ve back several times last visit february 20th 2010 this visit exceptional every way had reservation 8 30 arrived little early spent time bar area drinking wonderful tanq10 tonic watching olympics chatting dinner partner i would say age range people late 20s mid 50s crowd pretty eclectic mix we seated maybe 10 minutes reservation time extremely crowded night i mind we seat wonderful waiter juan almost immediately wonderful focaccia bread fresh french bread delivered table he nice show us plate one specials my partner apparently need visuals took appetizer order the steamed mussels red sauce divine hot tender tasty sauce overbearing seafood we ate every single one sopped remaining sauce bread yummmm next came minestrone soup for partner salad balsamic vinaigrette me love salad comes cold plate salad fresh crisp tasty partner totally enjoyed soup now wonderfulness pillows heaven asiago time lamb chops partner we shared amazing presentation taste temperature etc and last list dessert obviously big meal room much else i need something clean perfect answer italian lemonade really lemon ice slightly sweet tart perfecto juan waiter absolutely best attentive never wait anything as i said really busy night managed keep needs well seemed like 1 4 main restaurant the manager came introduced half way main course inquired things were it partner s first time got little attention manager can t remember name damnit nice actually came one time right ready go i would recommend place anyone going andersonville area it s prices reasonable ambience service well food worth every penny enjoy

reviewContent: as part birthday celebration wife i went carnivale past friday night it first time eating walked away high opinion plans revisit future for starters staff waiters nice helpful we seated within minutes upon check in we 7 30pm reservations 2 given table second floor overlooking main dining area the space beautiful formerly warehouse place renovated outdoor seating bar area adjoining main dining room vaulted ceilings brightly colored lamps huge glass mosaic cool decorations the atmosphere fun vibrant music playing background meal trouble hearing one another in fact loud enough drown neighbors provide little bit conversational privacy we heard positiive reviews mixed drinks wife ordered coconut mojito i ordered mojito millonario both good however i partial libation it dollars regular mojito 12 year estate rum used absolutely delicious worth extra expense in addition rum upgrade millinario add cava spanish sparkling wine forego simple syrup used regular mojito this made better flavor kick opinion the food ordered really hit spot well prepared perfectly to start arepas ropa vieja both great flavor the pork belly corn cheese cakes former nice pairing if i choose two though i would go ropa vieja the braised beef spicy mayo together ingredients made incredibly tasty combination plus rv give 4 little portions per plate compared 3 arepas dish regardless go wrong either for entrees chose churrasco bistek palomilla there clear cut winner mind dishes unique satisfying flavor profiles the meat cooked right tender bloody easy cut my wife made comment churrasco tasted latin american esque bistek palomilla amorphous although still excellent she may point regardless roasted mushrooms radish salad brisket mofongo disappeared quickly plate the sweet potato puree corn dish compliment beef tenderloin well since birthday brought us free dessert flan bits caramel popcorn plate i even see option menu hit spot definitely best i ve ever since free i complaining had surprised us i would ordered banana cream pie sounded awesome next time

reviewContent: my wife i regulars weekend dinners india house restaurant downtown chicago last several months saturday night 1 23 best experience far terms ambience service we opportunity visit india couple times learn indian culture last night india house brought back memories felt welcomed back india elegant young lady traditional indian clothes professional seated us best table available place super busy like every night my wife i impressed hospitality warm personality the food always excellent india house wide variety choices chicken tikka masala lamb rogan gosht palak paneer many more the naans garlic naan regular naan tandoori chicken die for like new budlight commercial goes not light not heavy i would summarize india house food not spicy not greasy just perfect i never miss opportunity go lunch buffet too best indian buffet i ever had i highly recommend place everyone

reviewContent: i may picky person come terms food choices having said that i find fitting i give authentic mexican establishment five stars it something quality makes wanting go back i ll start pros 1 out world margaritas hands down every time i come friendly neighborhood eatery order margarita i end leaving loaded even one mayan s margaritas make others seem synthetic try patron next day glad did 2 robust salsa practically considering salsa food staple mayan s salsa delivers freshly made taste definitely serious zing not mention excellent servers refill table s chips salsa constantly 3 seating as i lived around block mayan past two years we re always greeted friendly servers owner seated shortly thereafter i wait small bar area 10 15 minutes rarely made reservation there numerous occasions made reservations called whim see seating always tell us come over i never disappointed whether i ve arrived one person 5 4 service as aforementioned i picky one please nothing make aggravated turned restaurant service i go work every day half a job i expect general standard comes restaurant service mayan seems family operated everyone pitches make customers feel welcomed re filled pleased in addition i never problem making substitution dish or omitting cheese did i mention reasonably quick service 5 fish shrimp tacos amazing corn tortilla crunchy cabbage mahi mahi shrimp have both pico de gallo avocado mmmm they good i always go intent trying something new menu often not i choose tacos 6 ceviche shrimp scallop pico de gallo avocado lime juice delicious served saltines awesome tortilla chips great sharing friends 7 junior burrito shrimp fajitas tortilla soup combination plates delicious i one bone pick menu mayan also items laden grease covered cheese can t see actually ordered dripping oil many mexican restaurants serve food i make break it cons the thing was last time there obnoxious girls practically yelling talking one another table directly next us we could hear conversation needed luckily way shortly thereafter it seems much louder compact front restaurant mayan offer back room actually back room gets pretty rowdy too i think that s effect tequila overall i consider place meet criteria taste service value something keeps going back whether weekend weekday matter companions tow

reviewContent: okay first off i know place five stars people saying portions small tapas know food and price well worth flavors okay review yesterday boyfriend i stumbled upon place needed something eat waited someone jpmorgan chase corporate challenge done we trying choose tapas sushi boy i glad chose tapas when entered walking stairs astounded interior restaurant with high ceilings unique lighting modern decor i already happy choice as ordered thing i 100 happy red sangria mainly i figured would sweet like usually is i ve noticed city drinks stronger i later tried and yes i m copy pasting names menu online charred pineapple mojito fantastic it almost like pineapple version mike s hard haha but satisfied sweet craving for food ordered truita de patata i craving i would definitely order again the flavors fantastic pulpo con patatas great i never octopus i nothing compare to flavor unique meat tender guatla anec uvas y polenta quite delicious the roasted grape glaze quail die for but favorite thing plate goat cheese polenta croquettes that cheese die for i definitely want sample cheeses next time tocino con cidra best thing entire meal it die for if looking something fantastic get this combining ingredients plate got one best flavors i ve ever experienced for dessert ordered cremacatalana one best desserts i ve ever had that sweet potato ice cream amazing and combination bavarois yum pastissosd avellana i care much for that s i want first place my boyfriend really enjoyed though that s cup tea c and top off server amazing she knowledgeable everything menu great help came deciding wanted selling us food drinks i wish i remembered name though overall meal service ambiance fantastic never mind long walk bathroom well worth it i definitely would like come back soon try new things

reviewContent: so i sick couple days ago decided i wanted soup and what s better pho chicken noodle soup american officially kicked to the curb basically all friends order pho they re sick now i course order beef pho plus order shrimp spring rolls delicioussss i love everything comes side fresh bean sprouts cilantro basil lime who could forget peanut plum sauce comes rolls dark sauce hot sauce comes soup i like mine extra hot sauce just talking making want pho so i pretty sick i order delivery first time the owner sweet knowing i sick sent hot tea he promised would make feel better course did and really good tea he also said would take 45 minutes hour sad hear but surprise delivery person make place 30 minutes niceeeee crazy thing was food still hot yummy tummy and top off sent complimentary oranges what s better type weather vitamin c so good note i say want leave house lazy stuck somewhere order delivery might highlight day hope i helped make decisions lol

reviewContent: came group 4 saturday night last night restaurant week it first time trying ethiopian food not disappoint with friend i shared appetizer spicy lentils meal meat messob dessert sambussa turnovers raspberry sauce the meal incredible combined great prices five star experience the lentil dish amazing spicy strips pepper perfectly delicious scooped spongy bread offered every meal the best part able eat one s hands completely removes taste silverware that though subtle might interfere delicate layered flavors as appetizer two could easily fed three four the lentils incredibly filling though delicious i hold finishing half i would room dinner the meat messob wonderful we thrilled find different dish new experience for ethiopian before like indian food especially heavily spiced curries definitely go this the meats incredibly tender spiced perfection hot mild i like hot the lamb dishes favorite full spice overpowering meat s flavor come though some dishes bones may startle less adventurous diner never fear the meat succulent tender pulls right bone one dishes served smattering sweet cheese next marinated hard boiled egg perfect compliment meat offered light tasty tongue when dessert came i expected almond walnut sambussa bit like baklava unlike anything i d ever before sweet flaky little savory plus dessert combined sweetness whipped cream tartness raspberry sauce perfect capper spicy meal however favorite item menu was believe not coffee hot strong ethiopian coffee served clay pot wow from someone never coffee strong rich enough high praise it s served black saucer sugar side all friends spooned sugar cups enjoyed taste immensely pure flavor good strong coffee absolute heaven we coffee appetizers would lovely accompany dessert for anyone who s ever hankering ethiopian food mood try something really exotic demera winner good food good service our water glasses never empty checked back frequently enough make us feel well cared for great prices extraordinary experience
name: Lore T.

reviewContent: best ethiopian food i chicago ive ras dashen ethiopian diamond neither flavorful demera ras dashen nice vegan vegetarian options food bland ethiopian diamond little bland side well the mystery ras dashen ethiopian diamond customers ethiopian diamond packed go figure that saying line door means food good kitchen apply much case if want flavor go demera the manager also really nice however careful parking streets i got ticket parking taxi cab stand honestly never saw sign

reviewContent: it s appropriate make wonderful beer nurd s first review being constantly surrounded vino nice give wallet brain rest go approachable suds what better place hopleaf i numerous times numerous different people enjoyed every time the appeal name obviously suggests beer more specifically belgian beer hands down best selection stuff chicago i pride trying something different every time i go i lot however last time i went i went literally the champagne beer no miller high life malhuer methode champainoise dark brut a 45 bottle 12 deliciousness balanced idea getting loaded finished 750ml bottle so much giving wallet break this expensive beer offer celebrating engagement in case beer affordable chicago standards enough beer never thought i would say that the second reason come belgian alsatian cuisine my standbys every time i go belgian style mussels and or cashew butter fig jam sandwich served stilton mac n cheese the mussels done belgian style curry ginger serves 1 2 comes frites garlic aioli everything good though brisket rabbit salad if consider beer nurd aspire one favor check hopleaf out

reviewContent: well gotta play i cool moment went 10 years ago daytime bartender shirley 70 moved slow molasses january greatest bartender around there we got pulled jukebox played almost scratch free 45s dime i mean archie bell drells tighten up c mon no back dining room then two tiny rest rooms mens womens main floor one where could hear everything bar ahem leftover patrons bar hillbilly haven but michael louise turned great bar best beer selection i ever seen point drinking life they tv corner back wall then rarely anyone watch sporting events primarily but jukebox excellent musical tastes bartenders time perfect and i liked hearing stories traveling malta family s homeland trips discover new beer over years became popular thankfully changed basic premise offering wide selection best beers around budgets great food i remember couple guys stumbled apres cubs game asked genuine draft miller lite something like that i expecting sort infuriated lesson beer vs swill mr french voice calmly explained beer concept made couple recommendations they left happy yeah crowded made limit visits unless right open 3 p m pretty empty i d rather fight seat bar gotta admit i m anti crowd but i still stop every try something new beer been long still tried everything listen great music i heard bar 50 gazillion times gimme two steps ass occasionally snack great food

reviewContent: after much hype friends family girlfriend i decided check higher end steak house i die hard wildfire fanatic naturally i would stack restaurant them and i must say i dissappointed i would say overall food overpriced based quality calamari way mushy taste even get side dishes steak orders granted i m expecting entire plate side steakhouses including wildfire give least veggies side pay 8 small side what did pay worth price asparagus ok spectacular steamed mushrooms tasted like boiled garbage sides aside let s go steaks we opted get filet mignon medium unfortunately mine came well done medium still difficult cut don t get wrong steaks bad steakhouse i would expect ruth s experts cooking these overall i would rate food lackluster however service phenomenal i make big deal steak bring attention waitress asked was she offered bring new one i declined i ate bites already manager came apologizing overcooked steak offering bring another one i politely declined yet again before left manager came one time said took care steak bill saying we thousands steaks get right the steak removed bill again 5 5 stars service i d give food 2 5 cost quality perspective if i choice going wildfire i would hands pick wildfire our bill 2 glasses wine calamari 2 side dishes one steak after mine removed still 125 overpriced i m happy addressed issue steak

reviewContent: i mixed feelings glenn s diner a weeks ago bf i took nice evening stroll find place grab dinner bowman s packed lincoln square sort festival headed east montrose hoping find something nothing specific mind we came upon glenn s diner my experience glenn s prior two out of town guests found glenn s left devices without supervision came back saying best food world complete misnomer cereal boxes constitute diner therefore i skeptical bf said let s try it it beautiful summer evening patio anything beyond ravenswood tempting i said sure we sat outside i glanced menu i confused delighted incredible variety although crab leg special night 35 00 eat i felt 35 little steep amount crab i would able consume plus i think crab legs take special precision cook i yet convinced glenn s could master so bf ordered sword fish i sea scallops the scallops incredible cooked absolute seared perfection accompanied roasted red potatoes grilled asparagus the bacon mushroom butter sauce tasty totally unnecessary almost abundant bf loved fish happy clams food the service hand left little desired i confused blackboard specials different items menu pricing difference was our server inconsistent visits information specials i would definitely try glenn s always packed weekends brunch but i felt pricier food warranted

reviewContent: i 22 year veteran annual national restaurant association show chicago delighted invited guest reservation graham elliot while enjoying drink dinner munching signature popcorn host global wine expert commented unreasonably priced wine list our party five seated treated fun delicious first second courses i enjoyed signature deconstructed caesar salad brioche twinkie followed superb foie gras sadly my fond experience stopped veal entree difficult eat little flavor chewy protein our table review met variety positive negative comments evening shared embarrassment gracious host after reading review hard believe i fan chef bowles however i believe creativity effort exhibit anyone s passion life career take chances bring wallet ciao

reviewContent: my husband dined graham elliot night great time i must admit i bit wary i read recent reviews i excited nonetheless press we seated window bench table immediately got famous truffle butter popcorn and guys worth hype completely delicious buttery flavorful right places we tasting menu parings got try lot different dishes stand outs foi gras tasted like strawberry rhubarb pie lamb morel mushrooms amazing chocolate dessert oh gosh good thing buffet i d going back more not hot skate wing ham sauce husband liked well enough service lovely everyone knowlegable descriptions knew exactly going forks the wine parings delicious food too so lucky tour kitchen end hte night we met graham elliot got pictures taken him over great experience good food good laughs good music 4 5 5

reviewContent: got chance try graham elliot weeks ago pleasantly surprised wasn t sure expect going in found fear items gimicky totally unfounded the three dishes i particularly nervous about truffled popcorn addictive fantastic foielipop i could done without twinky ceasar really yummy the rest dishes 10 course truly delicious component them sometimes surrounded many superfluous additions some worked many lacked coherence ten layers ok i m exaggerating dish but i said worked worked the desserts outstanding you tell chef sweet tooth throughout savory fare really employs passion perfectly desserts the service really great get go starting cute bartender made exceptional cocktails our server pretty stunning right sort glamour reminiscent 1940 s film actress jet black finger waves poised stature charms yet hilarious intelligent time she incredibly helpful describing menu beginning answer many questions along way overall experience great

reviewContent: dined last night absolutely excellent time i young diner still high school northwest indiana i come chicago every weeks get food fix this trip i brought along three friends headed graham elliot the restaurant modern i expected definitely quirky eccentric vibe it they even serve wine giant erlenmeyer flasks the music great too definitely seems cater younger crowd from i ve read experience seems like staff graham elliot young clever our server certainly was she absolutely excellent perhaps one best servers i ve ever had often teenagers treated condescendingly upscale restaurants one completely respectful treated us would treat adults we obviously drinking age would probably annoyed servers offered us mocktails gladly accepted also one diners party sensitive dairy products waitress really tried accommodate best abilities even pointing us drugstore street lactaid pills i really like explain dishes arrived i found great differences looking menu actually seeing food front me the restaurant rolled spring menu week prior visit fare lighter like i said started mocktails between four us sampled summertime rapper s delight blueberry hill server s suggestion while obviously contain alcohol cocktails light fresh containing summery flavors we really enjoyed i m sure would even better alcohol not i ever tried it oh gosh i forgot popcorn amazing they definitely something idea much addicting usual bread butter it perfectly seasoned refilled soon bottom visible we ate two half baskets i would come back popcorn alone we ordered regular menu us selecting small plate cold hot large plate sea land i lucky able try lots menu items group tried order different things for appetizers duck satay carpaccio beef caesar salad sweetbread hush puppies i highly recommend sweetbread hush puppies great texture served wonderful fennel slaw i also loved brioche twinkie some genius thinking going there for large plates sampled lamb chicken salmon pork i get much chicken i get try bite gnocchi accompanied it one best things i tasted night the salmon light fresh be the pork served rhubarb jam yam waffle the combinations innovative modern work finally ordered four desserts chocolate espresso strawberry pineapple shared them the chocolate happened server s suggestion standout it served apricot jam complemented salty chocolate nicely if fan unique ice cream gelato flavors love desserts here they contained lavender cream cheese cardamom flavored ice cream absolutely creamy delicious graham elliot gets five stars young quirky atmosphere extremely kind attentive waitstaff innovative modern delicious dishes we back

reviewContent: we dined graham elliot friday march 26 the food amazing the chef must genius the food flavors textures presentations superb the carrot cake dessert one best desserts i ve eaten restaurant my complaint portion size menu items definitely try restaurant lbo

reviewContent: my fiance i went graham elliot friday early valentine s day i quite know expect given mixed reviews lately i say i quite satisfied for starters ordered duck confit potato bisque the duck simply amazing the apples bits duck fat delicious duck cooked perfection the potato bisque interesting came potato skin cheese sour cream proscioutto bowl they poured soup form teapot table it flavorful duck better for entree lady scallops perfectly cooked scallops i ve ever eaten she raving brown butter almonds next two days i sturgeon i never although i love fish the pumpernickel crust absolutely amazing cabbage sauerkraut great i even like sauerkraut i scraped every last bit plate for dessert chocolate ganache the crushed malted milkballs guinness ice cream great ganache actually generous portion we actually paid less thought would we signature cocktail also good 10 12 appetizers 10 13 entrees 30 dessert 10 overall nothing extravagant place go every week

reviewContent: from moment husband i walked in greeted warm friendly environment the popcorn fad trend actually best i ever had the server beyond cool opinionated i love the food good negative thing i see is appetizers far better main courses while i wanted finish every morsel wisconsin risotto deconstructed italian beef etc i mildly impressed main courses ordered sturgeon pork belly the wine beyond reasonably priced desserts although small yummy if budget would regulars i sent three couples since dining last month left happy

reviewContent: hi first ever yelp okay i really exited going graham elliot s i little disappointed based reviews i thought i time life eh the white truffle popcorn good first time ever creation i ve times also called parmesan garlic popcorn i also risotto cheezits creamy based i would liked ran little thick side for kind meal i would expect pay 80 00 person good i scallops tasty also nice variety beverage parings i thought portions fine

reviewContent: let say haters stay home take is deconstruct trying graham elliot as i told manger sat night your staff charming nice the food exquisite the prices fair ambiance awesome i know else right if considering going graham elliot go enjoy it let hype ruin fantastic dining experience it really unique high lights cheese top risotto a waiter showing restroom weird but nice touch people point general direction want drink 6 sat us right away seating options excited entertaining staff amazing food great music i feel alone wearing chuck taylors

reviewContent: i went graham elliot recently part birthday celebration i could happier from friendly accessibly service laid back atmosphere everything exceeded expectations and food exception i could list everything ate night menu changes frequently seem necessary here highlights the cocktail menu something everyone every one i tried delicious unique from savory peaches herb tropical almost paradise tasty fun favorite blueberry hill sweet yet tart lovely blueberry compote i could four more the sweet corn bisque could seasoned better every bite like celebration mouth i wanted eat eat eat the corn nuts gave texture garlic marshmallow different worth it i sea scallops entree i never knew fried pickles could go well anything each bite every ingredient together great scallops cooked well melted mouth dessert good totally mind blowing i loved use ingredients plating beautiful if blackberry panna cotta still available must try berry lovers of i one all all whimsical satisfying dining experience the portion sizes small side i think perfect try more it also pricey side i think reflected quality ingredients they tasting menu option 75 five courses i think it d worth try i plan go back menu changed i already can t wait if go open mind sense adventure place amazing

reviewContent: let preface saying i faux foodie means 1 palette refined my ideal meal consists anything guacamole cheese sour cream 2 i m frugal comes food i d rather buy new pair shoes 3 everything i ve learned food i learned watching bravo it watching top chef masters i heard graham elliot restaurant chicago two friends i decided check great experience turned be the ambiance causal welcoming i tired blueberry hill drink gin cr猫me de violette blueberry compote basil shrub kick evening tasty went easily don t afraid notion basil shrub drink white tuna sashimi appetizer seared alaskan halibut main course blackberry panna cotta dessert the halibut amazing literally melted mouth panna cotta looked like piece art the best part graham elliott service our waiter jeff excited zealous food contagious when server put plates properly placed us came twisted plates would served chef s vision when friend decide two different wines dinner waiter brought half glass each and discussing dinner riesling decided it brought sample us try regardless it pleasurable experience passion food contagious it expensive especially blueberry hills slid effortlessly gullet well worth it we left satisfied stuffed the graham elliot experience unpretentious casual fun way life food be a must try

reviewContent: we went restaurant past week pleased like many others heard mixed reviews ranging tries hard inventive after lengthy dinner i m between would definitely recommend people go see themselves the atmosphere wonderful bartender extremely personal we tried signature drinks worth price the waiter bordered slightly obnoxious let go the starter popcorn truffle oil amazing we two appetizers the beef tar tar standard fare little special it the kung pow sweet breads however incredibly flavorful much appreciated playful addition peanut brittle for main courses halibut beautifully cooked flavored pork loin done well standard fare we try famous foie gras lollipops incredibly salty interesting transition dessert the strawberry shortcake deconstructed best plate night incredibly tasty left wanting return that overall night mixed sampling great standard nothing poorly done the atmosphere helps the price bit high socks knocked off research going i think figure really winning plates are

reviewContent: mmm popcorn i took boyfriend ge birthday dinner disappointed though i say couple blah dishes the steak tartar appetizer bland the sauce accompanied anything i m sure great cut beef i also overly impressed ge s desserts i call concept desserts interesting look at came time eat nothing fantastic there i waiting surprise bite one regardless i like fact everything ge serves makes think the plating always interesting now positives the popcorn mmm seriously good stuff people granted i hosed popcorn butter oil home put cheese it it d probably equally tasty still props props due i think ate two baskets our mains also delicious they longer menu i fish dish boyfriend ge s take bbq wow i think mains really earns rep it s hard restaurant live much hype i must say i still think meal smile finally drinks really inventive i loved two i one blueberry hill longer menu if like experiment martinis ge place it if don t great wine beer selection choose from all in all try ge it s totally worth it mmm popcorn

reviewContent: i friday friend ge s reputation quality place reasonable price i d say exceed underperform expectations met them the music louder i expected i know ge billed fine dining without haughtiness i thought music bit loud i felt i needed speak loudly table partner could hear me however i enjoy atmosphere lack tablecloth nice place the waiter tried sell way hard buying specialty drinks i must turned 3 4 times sometimes man wants coke mmkay popcorn brought entree i found quite good the popcorn flavor rotates given ranch style can t speak styles course for entree i ordered salmon presented impressively plate i would highly recommend dish i normally hate beets i even enjoyed right amount flavor taste compliment food plate everything paired intelligently i molten chocolate cake desert even better entree caramel added side well small glass filled milk shake better experienced firsthand described overall i enjoyed experience graham elliott come away wowed disappointed if looking find quality establishment reasonable price ge definitely you if price issue expensive staples such alinea moto better option

reviewContent: tasty food restaurant treated like royalty my fiance i went 1 year anniversary three months ago i swore i would eventually create yelp account review i m still thinking meal what treat graham elliot was from start finish impeccable we greeted warmly door treated like vip guests the hostess escorted us table busboy promptly served us water special bottle swanky left table after ordered server brought us little black basket hot popcorn drizzled butter garlic dash salt all impressive first five minutes i ordered cesar salad recommendation came romaine leaves whole covered parmesan cheese greenish cesar dressing a bit strange first glance succulent for main course i chose short ribs also recommendation friend fell apart i touched fork them no need knife and little bed mushrooms underneath delicious i like mushrooms for dessert i remember had delicious desert drink i sort sweet concoction served martini glass pretzel dusted rim and let say time one us left use restroom came back perfectly folded napkin place setting too luxurious as leaving handed autographed menu chef himself amazing music by way great ambiance top notch service definitely go celebrate special occasions treat yourself

reviewContent: the cocktail menu favorite part i m huge fan one uses cilantro so unique would thought i seen menu mature year i think really cool it s testament chef s dedication success

reviewContent: wow place absolutely incredible we walked in hostesses friendly us sat us right away booth along wall we ordered cocktails i got deaths door daisy mmmmmm server treated us better could even asked for my boyfriend i started shaved salad must best salad i ve ever had i especially loved beets who would thunk then tried couple different dishes blackened cauliflower great garlic mashed potatoes then tried purist pasta simple delicious and maple bourbon pork roast lentils seriously heaven earth i could eat every meal every day forever so server asked us wanted dessert going say hell yes we tried brownies vanilla ice cream fudge first all made house need i say more secondly i might come back cocktail dessert i want try things menu fantastic job gilt bar i ll be back says best terminator voice

name: Chicago D.

reviewContent: just little background review my wife food professional 35 years worked or hired many top celebrity chefs food tv etc several times we love food last week chicago attended event morning included food drinks we walking clark st 1 00pm wife saw frontera grill thought would great stop try couple appetizers leaving town we actually got table right away ordered soup appetizer one entree waiter became extremely rude he actually said the salads top menu appetizers middle entrees bottom the appetizers small you filled up you need order another entree he condescending we stood ground obviously since knew wanted served minutes later the appetizer i remember was fine chili relleno entree good though much larger small appetizer tortilla soup aweful it completely balance way way much salt probably tablespoon salt small bowl we would told waiter never came back table ask us food was in fact finally wave waiting seemed forever check we going order dessert never asked just threw check rushed off horrible service food ranged ok terrible probably means skip frontera grill next time we re town
name: Mark H.

reviewContent: save money time we re fans top chef rick bayless first season top chef masters chicago excited go frontera grill as others mentioned wait interminable one wonders problem would taking reservations maybe would sell many drinks bar packed people waiting hour table well good margarita great one our local bartender makes better one but here s worst part food nothing special it ok not exceptional the pork i bit dry the black bean soup said dip pork good spectacular the tortillas fine also exceptional we told mr bayless cooking higher end restaurant next door that does take reservations had known that definitely would gone next door not waited hour standing packed bar want really exceptional mexican food try tlapazola lincoln ave near venice blvd la
name: Art L.

reviewContent: this may worst experience restaurant thus far for time i dying go frontera girlfreind opportunity presented i eager visit establishment heard many great things it plus i love rick bayless interpretations classic dishes i found cook book delicious i also visited newest eatery xoco i enjoyed food figured better things come frontera so last saturday five friends went 5 30 pm we put names seating list told expect 3 hour wait we said hey wanna try place spent time walking around downtown grabbing drinks we returned restaurant 7 30pm the clock stroke 8 30 9 00 pm still seated approaching four hours later still seated all hostess would say sorry little backed up needless say exhausted hungry standing oustide seating courteously offered water enduring wait it didnt help i enraged people clearly done eating sitting tables hour half many people still waiting seated having enough waiting left 9 10pm vowed never waste 4 hours waiting food again worst service ever and experience atleast rick good tv show no reservation bother and lets face it deicated enough wait 3 hours better get seated thats much dedication making reservation 3 months advance sorry im sure i ll three months now
name: Michael M.

reviewContent: disappointing experience frontera grill when meal arrived receiving wrong entree steak overdone sweet corn tamales tepid my companion received undercooked bitter rice 10 mins entree server unapologetic saying mistakes happen yes made mistake thinking frontera would good dined several times month i excited spotted rick bayless kitchen bayless master chef more
name: Edwin T.

reviewContent: considering expectations restaurant dissappointing there waiting line probably restaurant take reservations venue quite small doable the waiter personable service slow since lot tables wait on we started evening margaritas good small pricey 9 00 each we ordered grand seafood appetizer pretty tasty components well middle road components the entrees bad we ordered carne assada signature entree send back tough the others ordered entrees good fell short expectations no one took doggie bags home this cute restaurant town want claim rick bayless s restaurant however go restaurant high expectations food leave lot less cash dissappointment

reviewContent: uh i get it yeah frontera s food good i quite get much hype the food good doubt it best restaurant chicago let s get carried away the surprising aspect visit preparation margaritas i know restaurant size needs streamline process preparing most requested drink ordering margarita bar bartender simply reached behind bar grabbed mix poured glass ice handed me margarita 10 seconds tequila mix big ol jug at least add tequila something make authentic overall bad experience best either go early make reservation wait wait wait bit pricey you ll good time think the best place world many places

reviewContent: visited chicago holidays wanted go frontera heard lot it alex g s best thing ever ate yes steak good chicago meat real meat complaint staff work hugely popular restaurant seem take pride it smiles thank you fun cheer up guys like job stay home turn people off p s problem getting in afraid hard get reservations hype know pack em in

reviewContent: so i q saturday night friends birthday we 11 person reservation 9 pm i arrived 8 45 i could set table bday girl it obvious crowded overbooked we ended seated 9 30 pm we asking hosts updates timing manager decided lie us tell us running 15 mins late reservation 9 15 9 30 this complete lie i even looked shoulder saw said 9 pm finally seated apology complimentary appetizer delay fine i let it then waiter completely overwhelmed took 20 minute even get drinks i say food great i gave 3 stars customer service better 1 star

reviewContent: chicago q s experience first pickles chips amazing usually i m fan kettle chips perfect get stuck teeth hours usual i split pulled chicken brisket sandwich brother i say chicken juicy i wish cooked barbecue sauce the brisket also great tiny bit dry since cut small pieces still one best brisket sandwiches i ve had the cole slaw my side great gave much i getting sick end i do started mixing barbecue sauces e end switch u flavor amazing the original mustard barbecue sauces best mustard spicy horseradishy which i usually think is original right sweet smokey overall delicious the place interesting inside clean neat somewhat homey feel i would definitely recommend restaurant definitely going back 5 stars

reviewContent: i love place not food awesome staff great job we hosted rehearsal dinner party july son fianc茅e staff fantastic job the wine room worked beautifully party access whole upper floor mary catherine stephanie handled arrangements exactly i asked including wonderful custom menu card couples names picture the whole event wonderful thank you

reviewContent: went thursday night great atmosphere however it we group 3 ordered appetizer hushpuppies decent when appetizer arrived ordered main course literally three minutes later even made two four appetizers main courses showed two brisket sandwiches pulled pork sandwhich all three entrees cold including fries it felt like eating fast food very disappointing experience

reviewContent: i heard nothing great things chicago q so try it and i m sorry say i enjoy them i loved chips tea that i go back the food bland family maybe black used bbq tasting certain way i know this food perfect diabetic seriously chicken wings good but pork chop ribs good and absolutely hated mac n cheese yuck bland bland bland a no no me

reviewContent: i impressed food i tried restaurant restaurant week my family mississippi i soooo excited try barbeque the homemade chips good i bbq flight pulled pork pulled chicken brisket starter it came 3 huge pieces honey butter cornbread the cornbread good tasted like step jiffy mix my boyfriend shrimp lemon infused grits starter what disappointment i ve eaten grits life delicious flavor lacked big time texture they gritty seemed undercooked i really chew them the bbq shrimp really good i enjoyed bbq flight meat tender flavor smoky i next st louis style ribs now i would expected ribs either dry rubbed bbq sauced case it came small container sauce side i enjoyed texture meat it tender could definitely taste smoky bbq flavor lacking seasoning i asked cup seasoning put homemade chips seasoned ribs myself my son enjoyed meal but cinnamon ice cream tasted like big red gum the cinnamon flavor overpowering rather subtle complement creamy ice cream my son 7 never turns sweets eat it all all restaurant ok i would come back certain items menu i wowed all

reviewContent: our service amazing icing cake truly delicious meal our waiter great recommendations knowledgeable entire menu everything tasted a lot menu wonderful the bbq far best i chicago the ribs came right bone almost effort the brisket tender needed fork cut the pulled pork perfectly seasoned sauce even needed fun four options table experiment with the atmosphere fun energetic great celebration fun night out

reviewContent: let start saying service incredible definitely i consider bbq game changer i went first time friend becca girlfriends absolutely blown away according buddies even get special treat birthday this new idea ended loving it the fries sandwich served together bunched yummy tummy so fries end covered wonderful sauces grease dominate sandwich seriously place truly good gets within chicago s bbq scene my mouth watering thinking going again thank chips pickles

reviewContent: love love love chicago q chicago q fairly new restaurant area great addition gold coast i love atmosphere this restaurant open till 2 00am weekends i eaten 1 00am i eaten 4pm matter time is its perfect occasion hour chicago q always satisfies bbq cravings i cannot get enough restaurant after old town fest sunday decided go chicago q dinner we walked group six without making reservations the restaurant pretty busy staff extremely accommodating quickly pushed two tables together near tv guys could watch game their service outstanding as soon seated waiters brought complimentary pickles homemade bbq chips i obsessed pickles i always eat way many chips pickles i cannot help it they sooo good for entree girls decided split q3 chose brisket bbq ribs pulled pork we chose corn bread side ask honey drizzle corn bread we ordered side baked beans the baked beans huge chunks tender kobe brisket unique sweet spicy sauce baked beans sooo yummy pretty much meal own the bbq ribs falling bone incredible i would say kobe brisket favorite cooked perfection tender moist the q3 enough three girls we even left overs the guys hand needed q3 three ordered appetizer flight chicken wing appetizer q3 3 sides we left super stuffed everyone great time this restaurant consistent great bbq i cannot wait till weather gets little warmer sit outside i already looking forward returning restaurant next time i saving room dessert

reviewContent: this suggestion hostess last night two us arrived 8 pm we initially hoping sit bar drink then decided summer chicago let s sit outside only 3 many outdoor tables occupied total 5 people the temperature upwards 90 degreesand sun till bearing down unlikely would crush sudden outdoor dinner business yet despite empty tables hostess needlessly opinion declined request drink outside table i m therefore left bad taste mouth q obviously went customer friendly nearby establishment

reviewContent: upon stumbling past old tsunami restaurant i discovered chicago q contemporary finer dining bbq restaurant i first thought i come back but decided venture in i found staff extremely attentive absolutely found food phenomenal get this honey buttered cornbread kobe baked beans st louis ribs etc this restaurant moderately priced getting they make sauces love in addition remarkable whisky list make delicious mohitos highly recommended food atmosphere superb

reviewContent: my boyfriend i live neighborhood make point stop least week done since q opened doors perfect service amazing food never disappointed

reviewContent: the pickles start awesome went restaurant week had grilled shrimp app shrimp great dipping butter good well the grilled polenta served nothing special soft polenta grits would better accompaniment also meat sampler meat good best ever pulled chicken pork kobe brisket the bbq sauces side pretty disappointing the vinegar based one decent 2 thicker ones way sweet i think spicy one regular thick one red chili flakes added meh had kobe beef brisket entree i never kobe beef i know it i figured would real treat again good seemed pretty standard same 3 sauces served it help anything the fries ok could used 1 minute frying they barely done side done key lime pie dessert i enjoyed it nice light way end meal to sum up service perfect the food is good nothing special all all better going less hoity toity place bbq

reviewContent: i can t believe good food was i huge fan bbq place good all food fantastic the hush puppies die for we competition ribs world homemade key lime pie omg chicago full bbq joints stands rest it s hard find bbq place slather meat tons sauce here bbq dry rubbed sauce side you actually taste superb quality meat even need sauce my date hand add sauce little the service great not pushy gave us time enjoy food convo cocktails always full our waiter brian helpful knowlegeble menu you could see enjoys job he attentive hover he friendly fast gave excellent service whole meal i interested idea upscale bbq new huge fan can t wait come back

reviewContent: i delicious experience chicago q the d茅cor q modern country feel the walls ceiling white detailed wood the floors wide planked medium stain tables dark serve create nice contrast inviting way the service wonderful the wait staff attentive easy going gourmet bbq restaurant instead automatic boring basket bread meal restaurants serve served intriguing sweet pickles seasoned potato chips that pleasant surprise the artful presentation food goes traditional sloppy style expectations bbq experience though member dining group ordered his her items menu tasted everything so take food the hush puppies appetizer appealed eye display plate taste buds for main course i generous portion tender flavorful pulled chicken sandwich also included three different sauces dip sandwich full bbq experience my sides pickled onions cole slaw both unique flavor twist common food item made lunch even special one dining partners sliced kobe brisket tender side delicious honey corn bread the other chopped kobe brisket sandwich also tender flavorful the disappointment side french fries came last mentioned sandwich they unexpectedly dry heavy flavorless i thinking sweet potato fries would complimented dish much better the dessert large piece carrot cake big hit around overall lovely place grab delicious meal reasonable prices

reviewContent: i ordered kobe sliced brisket somewhat disapointed the brisket really lacked smokey taste open pit bbq it also somewhat dry i m somewhat brisket snob lived texas 3 years in texas get better brisket gas station rudy s this place even league salt lick the sides average would expect i thought service great contrary reviews

reviewContent: best date night bbq city huge portions great ambiance you get date night space service still good old bbq sauce selections included plastic ramekins course the service always stellar however always seem bit staffed could i hours i live block away can t say enough food everything great best key lime pie city take lady friend enjoy leftovers morning

reviewContent: the bbq service atmosphere chicago q world my group ordered bacon cheddar hush puppy appetizer blew minds slightly spicy fluffy flavor the picture website delicious puppies enough make drool you also served delicious pickel appetizer well southern spiced chips i ordered kobe sliced brisket side poblano cheddar corn bread i delighted choice the beef smoked perfection array sauces brought table made fun mix and match tastes my entire group highly pleased selections food drink what truly made chicago q stand attentive knowledgeable passionate wait staff crowed saturday night our waiter suggested pairings food drink extensive knowledge bourbon list prompt us seated wishing us well left full bellies positive taste upscale restaurant

reviewContent: what disappointment while service great food average dishes warm enough lacked seasoning their mashed potatoes pickled onions favorite things though burger good says lot bbq place the meats pretty flavorless the burger exception cornbread boring e g compared bandera s incredibly delicious cornbread pretty decor nice place go back food

reviewContent: visiting chicago business california i determined find really good bbq rib place nice part town close hotel near navy pier after reading reviews yelp we decided try chicago q our waiter latiff wonderful he took us thru menu made recommendations and delightful surprise informed us person charge bbq none leann whippen i watched leanne compete bbq pitmasters knew considered grand champion sport bbq without hesitation i ordered competition st louis ribs absolute best i ever had i passed 4 sauces served it flavor needed savored own the side jalapeno corn bread perfect oh and buttered pickles great start my guest pulled pork wonderful well make sure check place out and ask latiff great service smile

reviewContent: the classic clean design makes feel home immediately like visiting favorite southern aunt not one smells funny lots cats staff friendly informative eager please the real star however food the salads fresh nice variety leafy greens cornbread croutons tasty clever touch the sauces could use leetle bit variation may also come unfortunate side effect one spoon go three the barbecue flight appetizer would enough meal smaller person like me gives good sense entrees offer pulled chicken flavorful melt in your mouth tender pulled pork smokey well complemented buttery pretzel bun kobe okay i try kobe colleagues seemed happy of desserts favorites red velvet light moist excellent delicately flavored lemon zest cream cheese icing sweet tea granita terrific lighter follow heavy meal it s great southern inspired barbecue gold coast check place out real serious

reviewContent: uh pretty freakin tasty bbq full disclosure office went lunch place officially opened friends neighbors tasting basically meant got eat anything menu free and got tour restaurant kitchen and lee ann whippen of throwdown bobby flay tlc s pitmasters fame actually there that bias aside food awesome about authenitc bbq get upscale restaurant gold coast the guy works smoker told use 4 different kinds wood hickory cherry maple maple i think smoke meat the baby back ribs super flavorful pulled pork juicy tender they 3 different sauces two tomato based one vinegar great onion rings great tried piece chicken juicy great everything great well hush puppies little bland i care pound cake club dessert bananas weird texture bacon little top the place cheap reasonable would expect bbq flight appetizer like 8 50 totally reasonable half slab ribs 16 you go nuts pig entrees like 30 40 bring crowd get whole pork shoulder for 305 bottom line absolute must bbq enthusiast regular must everyone else

reviewContent: just tried chicago q first time last night i would definitely come again standouts include bbq chips sweet pickles others mentioned delicious the bourbon flight also outstanding deal bourbon fan my wife got pulled pork shoulder outstanding i got kobe beef ribs so so although great flavor falling bone advertised pretty tough actually still quite tasty i say i underwhelmed four sauces my favorite probably mustard based sauce tough one find bbq joints fan type sauce chicago q may mustard mecca my point contention i asked package leftovers failed include whole kobe beef rib untouched plate at 35 entree felt like pretty big rip include third entree doggy bag of course i discover next morning i unpacked bag as i said i would go again but next time i think i d stick traditional pork rib double check leftovers actually bag i leave

reviewContent: great bbq pricey almost worth it more specifically delicious bread butter pickles potato chips brought table menus the potato chips crisp salty we ll get back salty moment keynote taste q there s bit sticker shock prices 2x 3x i m used paying bbq the server s introductory speech made reference raising standard or bar something using extra special ingredients that ingredients justify much higher prices unstated strongly implied my wife i figured we d order basic items add others still hungry we split lettuce salad there enough got large soup bowl salad made fresh greens i pulled pork sandwich fries my wife half slab ribs cornbread those us standards one judges bbq restaurant pulled pork sandwich lots lots pulled pork pretzel bun reminiscent manny s deli sized portions corned beef there bowls spicy bbq sauce mild sauce north carolina vinegar sauce the pulled pork delicious without sauce it was however salty probably rub applied smoking all three sauces excellent pork half slab ribs meaty lean ribs very tasty also likely due extra salty rub no sauce needed although sauce hurt anything corn bread dense grainy texture slightly sweet taste very good french fries served hot i hate fries luke warm but crisp almost undercooked limp with attention lavished items seems intentional i can t imagine why oh yeah salty we took home quarter pulled pork sandwich three ribs the portions large this morning scale showed i d gained 1 7 pounds since yesterday i m guessing 1 5 pounds water salt dinner js

plenty it it topped w cheese house pickled onions and peppers i think the fries nature intended hand cut crispy if want fried spuds company grab ketchup instead order variety seasoned fries i like goulash pork schnitzel servings bit conservative price opinion perhaps i ve spoiled large western portions entire life i m laying kind dough meal i expect full we were i also mind taking doggy bag home enjoy later relive wonderful flavors one time had discount voucher i would elected pay comparatively exorbitant prices s dinner also since coupon waitress asked us we d mind added tax tip subtracting voucher this took us completely surprise we d never asked thing before thus caught guard agreed would fine thinking meant include tax full total would know add gratuity according pre discounted amount having worked restaurant industry i fully appreciate astonishing frequency servers get stiffed i problem tipping full total but brought back bill seemed though there d funny bit jiggery poker numbers made us feel though fooled subtle sleight of hand attempt bilk money us she added tip seemed presumptuous typically gratuity added check parties 6 more turned less would ve wound tipping simply allowed us own that said perhaps waitress learned lesson night also live music entertainment delightful but silence songs deafening made awkward conversational pauses seemed though everyone whole place could hear us including one waitresses casually eavesdropping repeatedly walked table she even banged chair one point paying attention conversation instead walking finally bill brought us envelope entertainment suggested donation 5 10 per guest as performer myself i understand wanting compensated services i m normally opposed pass hat situation but nice ish restaurant like little bucharest i expect hit cover charge like that especially overpriced menu items again rather presumptuous if owner can t afford live entertainment or chooses pay performers perhaps ipod cd would better choice it certainly seemed like bad form poor etiquette expect patrons pony even money top overly expensive meal we going back

reviewContent: last spring husband i traveled italy while naples birthplace pizza ate pizzeria da michele one famous pizza places naples ever since trip i craving unique taste it s combination san marzano tomatoes mozzarella di bufala high heat oven can t get anywhere then i read spacca napoli two weeks ago saturday night husband i tried spacca napoli it crowded though expected saturday night we waited 30 40 minutes table fun watching open kitchen seeing quickly pizza cooked less 80 seconds the owner playing host friendly passing delicious apps people waiting we chance look menu waiting seated take us long order i wanted bufalina essentially margherita i ordered naples very simple pizza tomato sauce buffalo mozz touch basil leaves deliciously thin chewy crust my husband ordered bianca con bufala essentially same minus tomato sauce fyi prices converted euros almost exactly naples our waitress friendly we ordered lemon sodas everywhere went italy our pizzas came fast owner stopped table offer us piece deliciously fried mozzarella when waitress set pizza front me i teared up it smelled exactly way pizza naples did it really took back wonderful trip more importantly pizza tasted same very authentic my husband s pizza bianca also delicious i also loved served knife fork like naples this typical ny pizza we thanked owner left told wonderful relive small part trip he friendly seemed genuinely thrilled measured expectations he also handed us tiny canolis to die for we ll back need taste italy again

reviewContent: in past 5 years i attended kinzie chophouse wide variety reasons celebrations including business lunch client work happy hour friends even celebrating 30th birthday out of town family members the main ingredient every visit kinzie chophouse consistently incorporates supreme dining experience quality food exceptional service from minute kinzie guest seated table moment exit service impeccable my absolute favorite menu option calamari my fiancee i order fried calamari every time see menu agree kinzie chophouse offers finest calamari city kinzie s recipe incorporates perfect balance hearty portion light coating paired choice equally delicious sauces the herbed baked goat cheese salad chicken wonderful lunch option one long goat cheese medallions remainder afternoon however kinzie lunch dinner destination hot spot happy hour specials offer unbelievable deals including caprese bites to die for mac cheese every time i request see wine list i pleasantly surprised see different options menu if i unsure i mood for servers bartenders consistently steer right direction finally chophouse kinzie disappoint my personal recommendation 16 oz bone in filet oscar style drawn butter amazing one important qualities restaurant consistency i know every time i enter door kinzie chophouse regardless occasion i going receive exceptional meal paired first class service keep good work

reviewContent: the first time i went big jones lunch table there i remember i ate remembered thinking really good food even though bf piece plastic food that huge clue the second time i went sister there 45 minute wait waited the service spotty start the waiter forgot sis drink forgot cornbread till reminded him manager i think proceeded spill gumbo table after debate sent gumbo back spicy it replaced worst sandwich i ve ever had the pull pork sandwich come fried egg like menu promised completely rubbery dry drenched nauseatingly sweet sauce though i planned get dessert i wait get there we ended getting cupcakes cream puffs nearby bakery 2 28 2012ahh yes big jones menu says pork sandwich served egg bun fried egg my bad this discount fact pulled pork rubbery sickeningly sweet

reviewContent: omg omg omg i can t believe i waited long eat big jones this little a ville southern spot diamond rough with many mediocre eateries hood true delight learn place cut rest my fiancee i decided finally eat weekend entered packed house cheerfully greeted hostess although reservation managed get us seated 5 minutes peak time our server danny amazing say least we informed wanted recommendations his explanations descriptions suggestions cocktail dinner menu extremely helpful decided go favorite choices he first brought us complimentary house crackers pepper jelly the crackers lovely cheddar flavor w tinge heat jelly world for appetizers crawfish fritters andouille sausage grits the fritters nothing short fabulous creamy cheese grits simply heaven for mains shared tallgrass burger w mac n cheese gumbo ya ya hands best burger ever had cooked perfect med rare w fontina cheese slathered sauteed portabello mushrooms onions w garlic aioli the mac n cheese ridiculously delicious the gumbo nice creamy texture perfectly executed rue it great smoky flavor without powering generous amount chicken andouille it we also delicious take cosmo w ginger vodka killer manhattan brandied cherries for dessert ordered mud pie danny said it s crazy good once again guidance steered yet another successful dish an oreo cookie crust w bourbon chocolate pecans served hot toasted marshmallows creamy rich caramel sauce yummers with quick attentive professional charming staff well fantastic food big jones missed 5 stars across board

reviewContent: i heard place bartender another restaurant neighborhood he recommended tuesday night special fried chicken i wait long chose visit big jones sunday afternoon brunch i made reservations i figured place would busy i m glad i did we seated immediately at first i little skeptical since i reservation seated right next kitchen however turned blessing indisguise since i right next kitchen i able watch delicious food come even discovered fried okra item listed menu and since i love fried okra i immediately placed order appetizer at 4 can t go wrong it delicious after polishing okra waiter who btw excellent brought us delicious complimentary beignets they still warm set table i seriously cannot say enough good things place we ordered eggs new orleans the bacon cheese omelet and excellent the omelet particular looked clean fresh greasy messy plate in fact food looked clean healthy fresh etc nothing came greasy cooked i m sure everything menu delicious our waiter phenomenal i wish i could remember name alas i cannot and even table right next kitchen great place sit can t say many restaurants i definitely going back brunch i planning trip back try fried chicken if decide make visit i suggest making reservations hand since i saw people waiting 30 mintues table food definitely worth wait big jones definitely one new favorites city

reviewContent: my cousin i went tuesday fried chicken night there lot great places eat chicago best around restaurant experience i ve long time the service outstanding made night treated well our waitress extremely polite overbearing when i question wine enthusiastically got answer me made feel great second glass the busser also wonderfully attentive yet non instrusive they made us feel good quietly helped us enjoy meal night out they give delicious corn muffins honey butter instead bread our grandmother send back anything come hot enough scald tongue food came piping hot fresh even grandy would ve pleased my cousin got fried chicken crawfish appetizer tomato soup bacon everything tasty town and top off atmosphere great it s simple well lit touches elegance like high backed chairs nice soft removable cusions you actually wash those everything really clean set place apart big jones find get it

reviewContent: contemporary modern twists classic southern cuisine best describes tasty treats found delightful andersonville gem a group friends went dinner saturday night 7 us absolutely satisfied experience the place packed they re long waits tables reservation immediately honored sitting matter minutes waits drinks lengthy forewarned waiter danny many specialty cocktails labor intensive we wait half hour appetizers treated complimentary boiled peanuts tide us over an interesting texture bean like flavor helped us forget wait for apps pulled pork grit cakes potato croquettes crawfish cakes all amazing add enjoyment served house sincere apologies yippie we also got round beers comped too big kudos big jones quickly acknowledging error correcting it for entrees shrimp burger beef burger fried green tomato blt gumbo eggplant fritter fish special the fritter bit disappointment fgtblt good flavors messy difficult eat burgers though amazing special fish equally delicious yumms mac n cheese fried okra we blast big jones informative attentive service enough sass keep us entertained all 7 us unanimous big jones awesome

reviewContent: i really loved big jones everything beyond expectations reading less kind reviews here my husband i along couple friends went saturday night dinner we reservation escorted table right away i bit hesitant host sat us backroom very small cozy but put ease server greeted us asked how guys manage get seated vip room i quickly got slight claustrophobia settled nicely we many questions familiar southern coastal cuisine server knowledgeable extremely patient kind took lot time we told several specials ran mouth like he d saying years without even peek special card we started specialty cocktails all good took little long bit stingy side price on recommendation ordered pulled pork grit cakes potato herb fritters appetizers both absolutely delicious set stomachs much anticipation for mains ordered three specials soft shell crab w corn bread stuffing pork chop w spicy mashed potatoes okra seared scallops w ratatouille asparagus my husband braised pork hock we asked wine recommendations sold servers advice prosecco girlfriend delicious red wine blend husbands all entrees incredible paired beautifully libations although intention sharing simply felt guilty allowing experience heavenly treats we finished evening rich dense red velvet cake perfectly executed to say wow big jones would great understatement this little andersonville star missed and far best server andersonville we back sitting danny s section we loved it

reviewContent: i second thoughts posting review incident i referring happened couple years back i back nuevo leon incident i went one night week wife ordered usual skirt steak i eaten least 4 5 times before the steak came i smelled something strange disturbing at first i think food thought might imagination i took first bite realized steak flat rotten i could believe let wife sniff shocked my first instinct take plate right front counter demand speak manger owner i want create scene i quietly called server take sniff she looked like i nuts that really angered me i said can t serious this meat rotten acting like nothing wrong she took bill asked i would like anything else we sat another 15 minutes discussing decided pay rest bill leave i never gotten steak got past chef server that s main reason i posted they may improved things since i never back always leery nuevo leon

reviewContent: there allegations sent january 8 2008 via e mail regarding food catered nuevo leon restaurant nuevo leon restaurant well respected family business located 1515 w 18th street it business forty six years 1962 over years the restaurant served and maintained thousands satisfied customers many coming restaurant years come daily basis our employees also exceptional nuevo leon restaurant accused catering contaminated food twenty five people november 17 2007 fourteen people supposedly food poisoning there werenever samples taken chicago health department reports doctors hospitals anyone admitted food poisoning event our restaurant never closed business allegation on november 17 2007 catering orders exact type food one came back complaint our food cooked daily fresh products ingredients we always strive best know type business deal thousands people always possibility costumer satisfied one reason another sorry inconvenience thank support the gutierrez family staff

reviewContent: my dissatisfaction of this place made me create a yelp account 2 stars food alright we moved lakeview couple months ago my sister ordered place day moved the food alright cheese veggie pizzas cant really mess up however hour half late over 2 hours total we called asked food multiple times said sorry drivers backed restaurants kidding me pizzeria share drivers btw unpleasant driver even though still tipped since wasnt fault the lady phone rude however give us discount next order so tried again time food came time buffalo chicken pizza would awesome however much oil sauce or w e use driver looked like criminal i was honestly scared taking my wallet out in front of him place would good worked the most important aspect pizza delivery the delivery itself trust dont usually judge people extremely hard to really hard find pleasant friendly drivers chicago

reviewContent: hey fellow new yorkers it may rays both famous original closest thing find awesome nyc pizza anywhere outside big apple i stopped whim one day i departing nearby diversey train station after talking owner minutes somehow time philly mentioned i immediately asked question all too often results blank stares chicago do white pizza his answer best thing i d heard day of course do for may understand jubilation white pizza quite common nyc east coast it s alternative all too familiar frankly rather boring red pizza sauce it s things like butter oil ricotta etc it delicious after perusing immense menu i spotted two east coast favorites bocci balls garlic knots this shaping great meal without hassle laguardia s baggage claim i got bocci balls garlic knots white pizza prosciutto arugula take away share wife the bocci balls incredible meat stuffed pizza dough as good as better place philly the garlic knots if live garlic apex garlicdom simply amazing the pizza white pizza w prosciutto arugula first off let say excited i get pizza cut like pizza pie slices i m sorry midwest squares really any ways pizza astoundingly good the perfect amount cheese toppings sauce crust that crispy without mall pizza soggy folded ever so perfectly making near perfect pizza experience in summation the pinnacle excellent pizza chicago go here order white pizza or pizza bianca call it you ll love it

reviewContent: had dinner lavilla saturday night group 10 people service friendly prompt spot on this rather nostalgic place take back 30 years older building dimly lit paneling singer bar very joyful crowd everyone seemed great time including along bar singing along entertainer a good place need mood lift celebrate something drinks good italian bread pizza bread good arancinii italian rice balls appetizer excellent salad bar straight 1970 s mediocre included entrees soup the spinach egg drop soup delicious the veal dishes excellent steak special steak covered onions crab meat mushrooms light cream sauce a bit skimpy crab meat tasty the braciole good a tad salty one better ones i ve restaurants the desserts cheesecake carrot cake cannoli excellent coffee we 3 hours never felt rushed good place couples groups will go back we split tab came 35 person quite bargain considering ordered 3 appetizers 3 desserts share
